sources.title: "The Broken Brake" (1920) starring Helen Gibson
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation     We have included this film in our program to illustrate the work and contributions of Helen Gibson, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. In 1915-1917 Helen Gibson starred in a serial by the name of "The Hazards of Helen".  She is considered the first professional stunt woman.    Directed by                     Robert Myles Produced by                   Capital Film Company Scenario                          Robert Myles Starring                          Helen Gibson, William Gettinger, Leo Maloney Cinematography            Carl Widen?
